snippet.title: Taro the Sneaky Ninja - Paperverse 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Taro the Sneaky Ninja is the stealth game Nintendo would make -- a mix of Mario and Mark of the Ninja, classic platforming and tactical stealth action for a cute but tough ninja adventure! Coming soon for Nintendo Switch and Steam!

✨Wishlist on Steam!✨
https://store.steampowered.com/app/352450/Taro_the_Sneaky_Ninja/

🚨 Follow us on social media for updates on development! 🚨
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TaroSneakyNinja
Facebook: https://facebook.com/StarfallStudioGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/starfall_studios
Website: https://starfallstudios.net

The ruthless Samurai army is at war with the ninjas! Play as Taro and his fellow ninja as they sneak through a variety of colorful levels swarming with Samurai, using their ninja acrobatics, wide range of equipment, and the environment around them to avoid getting spotted. A range of difficulty modes makes sure that players of all skill levels can play their way, from the newest of gamers to the most hardcore!
